alert.note: Alert for Bay; Midland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 9:36AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bay and central Midland Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 935 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sanford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Midland around 1000 AM EDT. Auburn around 1005 AM EDT. Kawkawlin and Linwood around 1015 AM EDT. Bay City around 1020 AM EDT. Essexville around 1025 AM EDT. Munger around 1030 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Averill, Bombay, Crump, Willard, Hope, Bay City State Recreation Area and North Bradley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
